meanings.definition: A person or thing that subtracts.
meanings.sent1: In math class, we took turns being the subtracters during the subtraction game.
meanings.sent2: The team of subtracters worked together to solve the math problem.
meanings.sent3: The subtracters at the bakery accidentally removed too many chocolate chips from the cookie dough.
meanings.sent4: The subtracters in the equation were like skilled artists, carefully removing unnecessary elements.
meanings.sent5: The subtracters, with their calculators in hand, were ready to tackle any subtraction challenge.

meanings.sent1: The classroom was filled with subtracters, each eager to show their subtraction skills.
meanings.sent2: I asked the subtracters to line up in pairs for the group activity.
meanings.sent3: The subtracters gathered around the whiteboard, ready to demonstrate their subtraction prowess.
meanings.sent4: The field trip was a success, with the subtracters working together to solve the math problems along the way.
meanings.sent5: The competition among the subtracters was fierce, but also friendly and supportive.
